items.title: AI makes further inroads into the mainframe ecosystem
items.description: Capgemini and Rocket Software each rolled out automation tools to help enterprises manage and modernize legacy infrastructure last week.

items.title: Globant: Thoroughly Discounted For A 2026 Rebound
items.description: Globant faces near-zero growth in 2025 due to macro headwinds and delayed IT spending, but this slowdown is sector-wide. Read my analysis.

items.title: Adaptive AI Market to Reach USD 33.6 Billion by 2032, Driven by Demand Across Healthcare, Finance, and Manufacturing | SNS Insider
items.author: Sns Insider
items.description: The Adaptive AI market is rapidly expanding, driven by growing demand for sophisticated AI solutions in industries like healthcare, finance, and manufacturing. The market is expected to reach USD 33.6 billion by 2032, reflecting a robust CAGR of 44.80% from 2024 to 2032.
